com.alienmegacorp.fileuploads
Class AbstractUploadedImage

java.lang.Object
  play.db.jpa.JPABase
      play.db.jpa.GenericModel
          play.db.jpa.Model
              com.alienmegacorp.fileuploads.AbstractUploadedImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, play.db.Model
@MappedSuperclass
public abstract class AbstractUploadedImage
extends play.db.jpa.Model

Image uploads.

In production, images are compressed with the Smush.it service. The service does not reduce quality.

Models that extend this class must define their own AbstractUploadedImage.Variants (probably as an enum).

application.conf must set the properties "aws.accessKey", "aws.secretKey", and "application.amazonS3Bucket" must also be set. If amazonS3Bucket is "false", the local file system will be used instead of S3. If not "false", the value will be the name of the S3 bucket.

See Also:
Serialized Form

deleteAllFiles

public void deleteAllFiles()
Delete all variant files from the local file system and S3. This is called automatically if the Logo is deleted, and can be called manually e.g. if a rollback must be done.

generateVariant

protected final void generateVariant(AbstractUploadedImage.Variant variant)
Generates the specified variant of this image and uploads it to Amazon S3 storage.

Parameters:
variant - Should not be the FULL variant.
